title: 42 Experts, One Mission: Advancing Platform Engineering
author: Todd R Weiss
description: Platform engineering experts unite through PlatformEngineering.org's Ambassador Program to share knowledge, mentor newcomers, and drive innovation at the edge of developer productivity.
cntitle: 42位专家，一个使命：推进平台工程
cndescription: 平台工程专家通过 PlatformEngineering.org 的大使计划团结起来，分享知识，指导新手，并在开发者生产力的前沿推动创新。
